alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 3:04PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Coconino Plateau, Yavapai County Mountains, Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino and Navajo counties, and the Plateaus and Mesas north and south of Highway 264. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will move loose debris and may damage trees and cause spotty power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 5500-6000 feet is likely from Tuesday evening into Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in periods of significantly reduced visibility on roads and hazardous travel in this time period.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
